name: MyDadFatherlyWisdomforAdults
0:
”Alexa, open my dad”
”Alexa, ask my dad if he loves me”
”Alexa, ask my dad if he is proud of me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my dad
des:
My Dad brings home a warm fatherly voice to brighten up your day. 
Perfect for adults who are missing a fatherly influence.

Try saying "Alexa, ask my dad do you love me?"

You can also say:
"Alexa, ask my dad are you proud of me?"
"Alexa, ask my dad do you believe in me?"

Never miss another day without a father figure to guide you.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select My Dad
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
